name: MKMultiPolylineRenderer
desc: A visual representation of multiple polyline overlay objects.

items.name: init(multiPolyline: MKMultiPolyline)
items.desc: Creates an object that renders a visual representation of multiple polyline objects.

items.name: var multiPolyline: MKMultiPolyline
items.desc: An object that represents multiple polyline shapes, each consisting of one or more connected line segments.
